hero.subtitle: Exclusive access to a wide range of cars and full support – we are your guide from the first idea to the moment you hold the keys: we advise, explain, warn about risks, and leave the final decision to you.

items.title: Constant communication and transparency
items.description: We are always in touch and provide an honest picture of the process: detailed photo and video reports at every logistics stage, timely updates in messengers, and complete transparency regarding your car's status.

items.title: Full support from selection to key handover
items.description: We select a car based on your criteria, provide professional recommendations, warn about risks, and expand choices if the ideal option doesn't appear immediately. The final decision is always yours.

items.title: Delivery speed
items.description: We select the optimal shipping port and route so the car arrives as quickly as possible and at the best price. We save your time and budget without compromising on quality.

items.title: Honest pricing
items.description: The car's cost is fixed in the contract. No post-payments, small print, or unexpected expenses – you know your final amount immediately.

items.title: Reliable partners and technical support
items.description: We cooperate only with verified services so that immediately after the car's arrival, you can undergo diagnostics, condition assessment, or quick repairs – without hassle or queues.

items.title: Support even after delivery
items.description: Our cooperation doesn't end when we hand over the keys. We control quality, consult, help with service, and stay in touch as long as needed.

items.title: Budget Start
items.models: Ford Focus, Volkswagen Jetta, Hyundai Elantra (2015-2017)

items.models: Ford Fusion, VW Passat, Jeep Compass (2017-2019)
items.desc: The most popular segment. You can expect fresh business-class sedans or compact crossovers in good trims.

items.title: Modern Crossovers

items.desc: Recent model years, rich trims, and low mileage. The ideal choice for a family car with high safety standards.

items.title: Premium & Electric
